question: A cuboid made up of 16 identical small cubes is painted green on all faces. It is cut into two identical cubes. Find the total area of the unpainted faces of the two big cubes.

question: Aaron had $55 more than Shanti at first. After Aaron used 2/5 of his money and Shanti used 1/3 of her money, Aaron had $27 more than Shanti. How much money did Shanti have left?
